tool.name: VCFfixup:
tool.description: Count the allele frequencies across alleles present in each record in the VCF file
tool.help:
Uses genotypes from the VCF file to correct AC (alternate allele count), AF (alternate allele frequency), NS (number of called), in the VCF records.
----
Vcffixup is a part of VCFlib toolkit developed by Erik Garrison (https://github.com/ekg/vcflib).
